Articles.Content: How do I make my EVA kerbal use his jetpack? He just floated away helplessly despite my pressing w/a/s/d.

The hotkey is R.

If you find your Kerbal spinning away because you bumped into something too hard, time warp can fix that.
In addition to WASD, use LEFT-SHIFT to go up and LEFT-CONTROL to go down. You may also wish to hit the L key to turn on the lights.
and pressing space makes the kerbal face forward. although its worth noting that up and down are constant for some reason - you cannot angle up or angle down.
You actually can change pitch apparently, by dragging your kerb with left-click. Haven't tried it though.
